## [title]
G8292-244838 - RFP for Audio-Visual Boardrooms Modernization Project

## Abstract
The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites proposals for the supply, installation, and integration of fully functional audio-visual (AV) systems for ESDC National Video Conferencing Modernization Project. This project involves approximately 280 buildings across Canada, with an expected completion date of March 31, 2028.

### Details

- **Reference Number**: WS4360995777-Doc4360995845
- **Amendment Number**: 17
- **Publication Date**: January 4, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 27, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

### Objective
The project aims to modernize ESDC's audio-visual infrastructure, enabling efficient and high-quality video conferencing services across the country.

### Criteria
This tender has been designated as a Request for Proposal (RFP), with the evaluation criterion based on the "Lowest Cost-per-Point".

### Trade Agreements
Propsers are invited from qualified suppliers who have entered into one or more of the following trade agreements:

- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Procurement Details
Contract value : TBA
Tender description : Supply, Installation, and Integration of fully functional audio-visual systems in approximately 280 buildings across Canada.
Contract duration : Up to March 31, 2028. 

### Contact
For additional information, please contact Alexandra Nadeau, Department of Public Works and Government Services at alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
